name: Audio Recorder
description: This component allows recording audio from the user's microphone and using the recorded file.

properties.name: player
properties.label: Show Player
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler to control audio player visibility.

properties.name: controls
properties.label: Show Controls
properties.handlerDescription: This handler allows to show or hide control buttons.

properties.name: fileName
properties.label: File Name
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler to control the name of the downloaded file.
properties.settingTooltip: Set name of the recorded file.

properties.name: fileType
properties.label: File Type
properties.settingTooltip: Choose type of the recorded file

properties.name: startText
properties.label: Start Record Button Text
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler that controls the Start Button Text.
properties.settingTooltip: Set the Start Record button text

properties.name: stopText
properties.label: Stop Record Button Text
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler that controls the Stop Button Text.
properties.settingTooltip: Set the Stop Record button text

properties.name: downloadText
properties.label: Download Button Text
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler that controls the Download Button Text.
properties.settingTooltip: Set the Download Record button text

properties.name: pauseText
properties.label: Pause Button Text
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler that controls the Pause Button Text when recording.
properties.settingTooltip: Set the Pause Record button text, when recording.

properties.name: resumeText
properties.label: Resume Button Text
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler that controls the Resume Button Text when recording is paused.
properties.settingTooltip: Set the Resume Record button, when record is paused.

eventHandlers.name: onStart
eventHandlers.label: On Start Recording
eventHandlers.handlerDescription: The event is fired when the recording is started.

eventHandlers.name: onStop
eventHandlers.label: On Stop Recording
eventHandlers.handlerDescription: The event is fired when the recording is stopped.

eventHandlers.name: onDownload
eventHandlers.label: On Download File
eventHandlers.handlerDescription: The event is fired when the recorded file starts downloading.

eventHandlers.name: onStateChange
eventHandlers.label: On State Change
eventHandlers.handlerDescription: The event is fired when the recorder state is changed.
